titles.title: O Yes, It's You In The Midst Of Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O yes, it's You in the midst of me.
You're the water running free
Around the tree of my city.
O, You're the Lamb who is the light.
There's no more night; all the tears are gone,
And the sorrow has flown
To the Christ in the midst of me.
